到達目標:
Students will be able to practice test taking strategies.
Students will be able to practice the vocabulary needed for the reading, listening, speaking and writing sections of the IELTS test.
特記事項: 本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.

第4回: Learning about the writing section Part 1.
第5回: Learning about the writing section part 2.
第7回: Model test 1 - Listening and reading practice.
第8回: Model Test 1 - Writing and speaking practice.
第9回: Model test 2 - Listening and reading practice.
第10回: Model Test 2 - Writing and speaking practice.
第11回: Model test 3 - Listening and reading practice.
第12回: Model Test 3 - Writing and speaking practice.
第13回: Review class - students can self study the textbook in the class and ask the teacher questions.
第14回: Final Test - writing section and reading section practice.

成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.

name: 【250】Skills-based English(IELTS)　３／Skills-based English(IELTS)
